email_chain.subject: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Following up on our call earlier, I’m pleased to provide a freight quote for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. We’re looking at a rate in the low 50s, say $50.75 per metric ton, based on a cargo size of 80,000 MT. The vessel we’re considering is the MV Ocean Star, a modern VLCC with a DWT of 320,000 and LOA of 330 meters. Laycan is tentatively set for October 20-25. Let me know your thoughts!

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Thanks for the quick response. The rate seems a bit on the higher side given the current market. Would you be able to come down to $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm if the vessel is fully compliant with the latest IMO regulations? 

Looking forward to your reply.

Cheers,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Thanks for your feedback. I understand your concern about the rate. After discussing with the owner, we can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the vessel’s specifications and compliance with IMO 2023 regulations. The MV Ocean Star is indeed fully compliant, and we can provide the necessary documentation upon request. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

$50.00 sounds reasonable. Let’s proceed with that. Can you confirm the laycan dates and provide details on demurrage terms? Also, please ensure the vessel will be ready to load on October 20 as agreed.

Thanks,
John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi John, 

Great, I’ll lock in the rate at $50.00 per metric ton. Laycan remains October 20-25, and the vessel will be ready to load on the 20th as planned. Demurrage is set at $25,000 per day, pro rata, payable in USD. I’ll send over the recap shortly for your review.

Best regards,
Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body:
Hi Sarah, 

Everything looks good. Please proceed with the recap, and let’s finalize the charter party. Looking forward to working with you on this shipment.

Cheers,
John
